title: Look at Wales
brief_description: A selection of the tourist attractions in the towns, villages and countryside of Wales. Includes scenes of the Royal National Eisteddfod, and landscapes of mountain and valley contrasted with the bustling civic centre of Cardiff.
description: A selection of the tourist attractions in the towns, villages and countryside of Wales. Includes scenes of the Royal National Eisteddfod, and landscapes of mountain and valley contrasted with the bustling civic centre of Cardiff.
